data.title: React.js Developer
content: Optimised component life cycle practices using advanced ReactJS and NextJS, enhancing performance and resource management in web and desktop application development.
Reduced unnecessary re-renders by 25% and refined data flow consistency through Redux implementation.
Improved development efficiency by 30% and ensured a consistent, customisable design system by leveraging Tailwind CSS for reusable components.
Developed a React SDK for streamlined application integration, boosting functionalities and contributing to robust software ecosystems.
Acquired expertise in Web3 and Blockchain architecture, demonstrating a deep understanding of underlying mechanics for seamless application development.

data.title: Web Developer
content: Designed and developed a hackathon portal for MOEâ€™s Innovation Cell using Django, MySQL, and Bootstrap, facilitating secure idea evaluation and submissions from over 160,000 students.

Built and presented 'Khel Hindustan,' a web platform for the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports, leveraging Flask (Python), SQLite, and JavaScript to automate application submission, real-time tracking, and NLP-based screening, reducing manual processes by 40%.

Developed a unified verification system using Python and OpenCV, incorporating facial recognition and fingerprint extraction with the SIFT algorithm, improving accuracy and efficiency in citizen data access.
